title: I DID A SURVEY FOR RP GIVEAWAY AND LETTERS ARE STILL NOT POSSIBLE TO SEE!!!
body: i did a survey on the new rp giveaway and i still cant see rest of the letters in the code please help

replies.body: I'm not aware of any RP giveaway, and I agree with DTN that you may have stumbled on a phishing site.  Please make sure to[ secure your account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204048924-Security-tips) to prevent a compromise.  Be wary of visiting sources that claim to offer free content if it's not an official source!  Let me know if you have any questions.
What are you talking about? You didn't fall for a scam, did you? (please do ***not*** share the link)
